text: Juna manisaharule imana lya'e ra hijarata(pravasa) gare ra allahako margama aphna ji'uâ€“jyana ra dhana sampatti laga'era dharmayud'dha gare ra jasale uniharula'i sarana di'e, ra sahayata gare yi sabai parasparama eka'arkaka mitra hun, ra jasale imana ta lya'echan tara hijarata garenan, uniharuko timisita mitratako kunai sambandha chaina, jabasam'ma uniharu hijarata gardainan. Kintu yadi uniharule dharmako kurama timisita sahayata mamgchan bhane timila'i anivarya huna jancha ki sahayata gara, matra yasabaheka ki yo sahayata kunai yasto kaumako mukabilama cha josita timro kunai sandhi cha.
